about.title: We’re a game influencer agency.
about.description: We’ve connected heroic brands and publishers with the right gaming talent for wildly creative, record-breaking promotions and endorsements across the video game industry. Gaming is about more than games and we’re here to prove it.

case-studies.title: Selling new headphones with Audio-Technica
case-studies.description: From writing the script to sourcing the right talent, Loaded crafted a storyline that resonated with gamers from around the globe which led to day one backorders for Audio-Technica’s new ATH-ADG1x headphones.

case-studies.title: Breaking viewership records with Sheriff Eli
case-studies.description: Although his own unique personality helped propel him into everyone’s hearts, Loaded was there before anyone to design his brand, land pre-launch sponsorships, and give him access to real-time NOSCOPE data insights to ensure his first stream on Twitch would be impossible to miss.

newsletter.title: Let us send you our case studies, and we’ll keep in touch...
